descriptionNullable:
### Content
This Dataset contains daily data about the situation of Covid-19 in Morocco.

## How to use it?
The dataset includes 16 columns: date, confirmed cases, deaths, Recovered, and count of cases across each of the 12 Moroccan regions. 
It is a good source for data visualization or exploring different models of disease transmission.

The dataset will be updated according to the official data each day at +01:00(GMT)

### Source:
- http://www.covidmaroc.ma/pages/Accueil.aspx
- https://who.sprinklr.com/region/emro/country/ma
- https://www.hespress.com/ ||  https://covid.hespress.com/
- https://covidata.2m.ma/
- https://www.marocovid.com/
- https://www.facebook.com/ministere.sante.ma/
title: Morocco-coronavirus
subtitle: Evolution of Covid-19 in Morocco
